page.title: 13ACTIVITIES AT HOLY CROSS
page.content: Each day we start with half an hour of {silent reading.}Then at 9.30 a.m. we have{assembly,}where the whole school congregates -there is normally a reading followed by a prayer and a song. Assembly lasts for about 15 minutes. From this period, until 3.15 p.m. all curriculum acticities are taught by the class teacher. Apart from the general curriculum, there is{swimming}during the summer - we have our own learners swimming pool in the grounds. There are also activities after school -{football; {netball;gymnastics;bird watching; and {canoeing. At the present time we have one {computer}(a single disk-drive ; VDU; and printer ) - so the 4th years have use of it for 1 and 1/2 terms after which the 3rd years will also use it.
